items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 140 distinct venues!
You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 45 states or countries. Visit 5 more for Level 10!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 345 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 70!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 170 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 35!

venue.venue_name: The Bower and Urban Corner Cafe

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 320 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 65!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 35 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 8!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 175 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 36! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That’s 5 beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 2.

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 60 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 13!
Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least That's 490 distinct venues!

There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 435 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 88!
Looks like you're getting around. You've enjoyed at least 25 different beers!

items.checkin_comment:
First Monteith's for a long time.

Passable with a hint of citrus.

At the source, apparently. * 

* Probably not brewed in Greymouth

items.badge_description: It's New Brew Thursday! Drink any beer you have never had before on three different Thursdays in a 20 day period.

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 110 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 23!

Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 30 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 7.

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 25 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 6!
Thanks for enjoying one of over 102 craft beers on offer here at Brew on Quay! Come back and keep tagging us to unlock more badges and special offers!

items.badge_name: Super Style: IPA - New England / Hazy (Level 18)
items.badge_description: The haze craze is here for days. The third in our series of “Super Style” badges, this one celebrates New England-style / hazy IPAs, which ranked as the 2nd most checked-in style of 2021. AVAILABLE ONLY TO UNTAPPD INSIDERS.

Kiwis, rugby and sheep aren’t the only things New Zealand has to offer. There’s a ton of great beers in a variety of styles just waiting for you to explore! That's 10 different beers from a brewery in New Zealand. Try 5 more for Level 3.
